content:
The Kong Classic Dog Toy with Holes is an excellent choice for Max! Kong toys are indeed very popular among dog owners, and for good reason – they're durable, versatile, and provide endless fun for our furry friends.

It's great to hear that Max is enjoying his new dog bed from PetSmart! A comfortable and cozy bed is essential for a happy pup. The black and brown color scheme sounds stylish, and I'm sure Max appreciates the soft cushion. Golden retrievers love to snuggle up and get comfortable, so it's wonderful that you've found a bed that meets his needs.

Remember to stuff the Kong toy with Max's favorite treats or kibble, and let him enjoy the challenge of getting them out. You can also experiment with different fillings, such as peanut butter, cream cheese, or even canned dog food, to keep things interesting.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope Max enjoys his new Kong toy and continues to snooze comfortably on his new bed!
